header.title: Empeereza Zaffe
header.subtitle: Obujjanjabi bw'amaaso obw'omutindo nga bukoledwa okusinziira ku byetaago byo

traditional.title: LASIK Eyabulijjo
traditional.description: LASIK Eyabulijjo ye ngeri yaffe eyabulijjo ey'okulongoosa okulaba nga tukozesa ekiziyiza amaaso, era etuyambyeko okuwonyeza abantu obukadde bungi mu nsi yonna nga basobola okuva ku gaggali n'endabi.
traditional.how_works_text: Mu LASIK Eyabulijjo, omusawo akozesa microkeratome (ekiso eky'obujjanjabi) okukola ekibikka ekitono ku cornea. Ekibikka kino kizuulibwa, naye ekitundu eky'omunda kya cornea kisalibwa laser ekiyitibwa excimer okukyuusa okulaba kwo. Ekibikka kino kizzibwayo nga kizingibwa okukuuma ebitundu ebirala nga biwona.
traditional.candidates_text: Oyinza okuba nga olina ebyetaago byonna bya LASIK Eyabulijjo bwoba:

candidates.item2: Okulaba kwo nga tekukyukakyuka okumala omwaka ogumu oba okusingawo
candidates.item3: Nga olina okutolaba, okulabirako, oba astigmatism eyabulijjo
candidates.item4: Nga cornea yo eri munene ekimala
candidates.item5: Nga tolina ndwade ndala mu maaso

traditional.recovery_text: Abalwadde abasinga balaba nga bakyuse mu maaso gaabwe mu ngeri ennungi oluvannyuma lwa ssaawa 24. Okuwona okutuukiridde kitwala sabbiiti 1-2, naye okulaba okutuukiridde kugwanira kubeera mu mwezi gumu. LASIK Eyabulijjo erina amanyi mangi, ng'abantu 96% bafuna okulaba kwe baagala.

custom.title: LASIK Etali ya Kiso
custom.description: LASIK Etali ya Kiso y'engeri eyawaggulu, obukoledwa na laser bokka, ng'erina obulungi bungi n'okutegekebwa okw'omuntu ssekinnoomu okusobola okutuusa okulaba okw'okuntikko.
custom.how_works_text: Mu LASIK Etali ya Kiso, tukozesa laser bbiri eza njawulo: femtosecond laser okukola ekibikka ku cornea (mu kifo ky'ekiso), ne wavefront-guided excimer laser okukyuusa cornea. Enkola eno eyamba okukola ekibikka n'obulungi obusingawo n'okujjanjaba okukolebwa okusinziira ku ndabi yo entuufu.

benefits.item2: Enteekateeka ey'obujjanjabi ng'esinziira ku mbeera z'amaaso ago
benefits.item3: Okusobola okulaba obulungi mu kiro n'awali ekitangaala okusingako ku LASIK Eyabulijjo
benefits.item4: Obusobozi okukyusa aberrations eza higher-order (okutabulwatabulwa mu kulaba)
benefits.item5: Ky'ekisinga obulungi eri abali ne cornea entono oba bakozesa gaggali ennyingi

custom.right_for_you_text: Newankubadde nga esinga okuba ey'omuwendo okusingako ku LASIK Eyabulijjo, LASIK Etali ya Kiso etera okuba ekintu ekisaanye okulowoozebwako singa olina ebizibu eby'okulaba ebizibu, higher-order aberrations, oba oyagala tekinologiya esinga. Abasawo baffe banaakulaga bye weetaaga mu kukulaba.

prk.title: PRK (Photorefractive Keratectomy)
prk.description: PRK y'ekirala ekirungi mu bifanaganako ne LASIK eri abalwadde abatayinza kukolerwa mu nkola za flap. PRK ye yali enkola eyasooka eya laser era ekyaleeta ebiva mu kubaddewo ebirungi.
prk.how_works_text: Mu PRK, omusawo aggya ekisaanikira eky'olubereberye ekya cornea (epithelium) mu kifo ky'okukola ekibikka. Laser ya excimer n'ekyusa cornea okukyusa okulaba kwo. Epithelium ekulukuta eyinza okuzaala nate mu nnaku ntono oluvannyuma lw'okukolebwako.

candidates.item1: Nga olina cornea entono etakugwanira LASIK
candidates.item2: Nga okola emirimu oba ng'ozannya emizannyo egyinza okuletawo obuzibu ku maaso go (ng'amagye, emizannyo gye kugwangana)

prk.recovery_text: Okuwona oluvannyuma lwa PRK kitwala ekiseera kinene okukira LASIK, naye okulaba okutuukirivu kujja mu myezi 1-3. Eky'okumanya nti ebiva mu kubaddewo ku PRK biri ku mutindo gwe gumu ne LASIK, ate PRK tegenda kukuwa buzibu buva ku bibikka.

presbyopia.title: Okujjanjaba Presbyopia
presbyopia.description: Presbyopia ndwadde ey'emyaka egitera okukwaata abantu bonna abaweza emyaka 40, nga bagenda mu maaso baremererwa okulaba ebintu ebiri okumpi. E Vision Clarity Institute, tulina enkola nnyingi okukolako ku presbyopia.
presbyopia.monovision_text: Mu nkola eno, eriiso limu litereezebwa okulaba wala, n'eddala okulaba kumpi. Obwongo bwo buyiga okukozesa eriiso elisaanidde okusinziira ku ky'olaba. Kino kiyiza okukendeeza obwetaavu bw'endabi z'okusoma.
presbyopia.multifocal_text: Nga tukozesa tekinologiya ya laser eyomulembe, tusobola okuteekamu enfo z'okulaba ezenjawulo ku cornea yo, okusobozesa okulaba bulungi ku nfo z'enjawulo. Enkola eno eyomulembe esobola okutuusa ebivamu ebirungi eri abagikwanira.
presbyopia.rle_text: Eri abamu, naddala abaweza emyaka 50 n'okusingawo, okukyusa lenssi eyabulijjo ey'eriiso n'eyo ey'emirundi emingi eyinza okuba ekisinga obulungi. Enkola eno efaanagana n'eyo ey'okujjanjaba eriiso eritategeerekeka, naye ekolebwa nga eddogo terinajja.
presbyopia.determination_text: Mu kukulambula, abakugu baffe banaayekeneenya okulaba kwo, ne bakwogerako ku nkola yo ey'obulamu n'ebyetaago byo mu kulaba, era balikuwabula mu kukegera enkola esinga okukugwanira ey'okujjanjaba presbyopia.

cta.title: Olina Okuteekateeka Okulaba Bulungi Nga Tokozesa Gaggali?
cta.content: Teekawo okukebera okutaliimu sente leero okusobola okumanya enkola ey'okulongoosa okulaba ekusaanira.

consultation.title: Teeka Okulambulwa
consultation.success: Weebale! Okusaba kwo kutuusizzwa. Tujakukutukiirira mangu.

inquiry.title: Buuza Ebibuuzo
inquiry.success: Weebale olw'okusaba. Ekibinja kyaffe kijakuddamu ebibuuzo byo mangu.

form.title: Kitiibwa
form.name: Erinnya
form.consent: Nzikiriza Vision Clarity Institute okukunga n'okukuuma ebiwandiiko byonna wakati waffe.
